overview: The life of Jorge, 12, eldest son of a modest Spanish family of the 90s, turns upside down when the emotional turmoil caused by his sexual awakening is mixed with an accusation against his father, an art teacher, of an alleged sexual harassment of a 16-year-old girl, which disintegrates his family nucleus. His attempts to try to understand and overcome events lead Jorge to a new vision of his father, his family and his own nature.
title: The Sinner's Son
